title: ArrangePlugin seg-faults if SetArrangement is called after a model is deleted

content.html:
I tried the following to fix it, but it doesn't help:

diff -r 07900b8ef82f plugins/ArrangePlugin.cc
--- a/plugins/ArrangePlugin.cc  Thu Oct 09 11:54:13 2014 -0700
+++ b/plugins/ArrangePlugin.cc  Fri Oct 10 11:17:52 2014 -0700
@@ -149,6 +149,7 @@
 /////////////////////////////////////////////////
 bool ArrangePlugin::SetArrangement(const std::string &_arrangement)
 {
+  bool result = true;
   if (this->arrangements.find(_arrangement) == this->arrangements.end())
   {
     gzerr << "Cannot SetArrangement ["
@@ -179,9 +180,20 @@
       // use initial pose
       pose = iter->second->pose;
     }
-    model->SetWorldPose(pose);
-    model->ResetPhysicsStates();
+    if (model)
+    {
+      model->SetWorldPose(pose);
+      model->ResetPhysicsStates();
+    }
+    else
+    {
+      gzerr << "model ["
+            << iter->first
+            << "] may have been deleted"
+            << std::endl;
+      result = false;
+    }
   }
-  return true;
+  return result;
 }
